verses.verse: Let God <WH430> arise <WH6965>, let his enemies <WH341> be scattered <WH6327>: let them also that hate <WH8130> him flee <WH5127> before him <WH6440>.

As smoke <WH6227> is driven away <WH5086>, so drive them away <WH5086>: as wax <WH1749> melts <WH4549> before <WH6440> the fire <WH784>, so let the wicked <WH7563> perish <WH6> at the presence <WH6440> of God <WH430>.
But let the righteous <WH6662> be glad <WH8055>; let them rejoice <WH5970> before <WH6440> God <WH430>: Yes <WH8057>, let them exceedingly rejoice <WH7797>.

Sing <WH7891> unto God <WH430>, sing praises <WH2167> to his name <WH8034>: extol <WH5549> him that rides <WH7392> upon the heavens <WH6160> by his name <WH8034> Jah <WH3050>, and rejoice <WH5937> before him <WH6440>.
A father <WH1> of the fatherless <WH3490>, and a judge <WH1781> of the widows <WH490>, is God <WH430> in his holy <WH6944> habitation <WH4583>.

God <WH430> sets <WH3427> the solitary <WH3173> in families <WH1004>: he brings out <WH3318> those which are bound <WH615> with chains <WH3574>: but the rebellious <WH5637> live <WH7931> in a dry land <WH6707>.
O God <WH430>, when you went forth <WH3318> before <WH6440> your people <WH5971>, when you did march <WH6805> through the wilderness <WH3452>; Selah <WH5542>:

The earth <WH776> shook <WH7493>, the heavens <WH8064> also dropped <WH5197> at the presence <WH6440> of God <WH430>: even Sinai <WH5514> itself <WH2088> was moved at the presence <WH6440> of God <WH430>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>.
You <WH430>, O God, did send <WH5130> a plentiful <WH5071> rain <WH1653>, by which you did confirm <WH3559> your inheritance <WH5159>, when it was weary <WH3811>.
Your congregation <WH2416> has lived <WH3427> in it <WH430>: you, O God, have prepared <WH3559> of your goodness <WH2896> for the poor <WH6041>.
The Lord <WH136> gave <WH5414> the word <WH562>: great <WH7227> was the company <WH6635> of those that published it <WH1319>.
Kings <WH4428> of armies <WH6635> did flee <WH5074> apace <WH5074>: and she that stayed <WH5116> at home <WH1004> divided <WH2505> the plunder <WH7998>.

Though you have lain <WH7901> among the pots <WH8240>, yet shall you be as the wings <WH3671> of a dove <WH3123> covered <WH2645> with silver <WH3701>, and her feathers <WH84> with yellow <WH3422> gold <WH2742>.
When the Almighty <WH7706> scattered <WH6566> kings <WH4428> in it <WH7949>, it was white as snow in Salmon <WH6756>.
The hill <WH2022> of God <WH430> is as the hill <WH2022> of Bashan <WH1316>; a high <WH1386> hill <WH2022> as the hill <WH2022> of Bashan <WH1316>.

Why leap <WH7520> you <WH1386>, you high hills <WH2022>? this is the hill <WH2022> which God <WH430> desires <WH2530> to live in <WH3427>; Yes <WH3068>, the Lord will live <WH7931> in it for ever <WH5331>.
The chariots <WH7393> of God <WH430> are twenty thousand <WH7239>, even thousands <WH505> of angels <WH8136>: the Lord <WH136> is among them <WH5514>, as in Sinai, in the holy place <WH6944>.

You have ascended <WH5927> on high <WH4791>, you have led captivity <WH7628> captive <WH7617>: you have received <WH3947> gifts <WH4979> for men <WH120>; Yes <WH5637>, for the rebellious also <WH3050>, that the Lord God <WH430> might live among them <WH7931>.
Blessed <WH1288> be the Lord <WH136>, who daily <WH3117> loads <WH6006> us with benefits <WH410>, even the God of our salvation <WH3444>. Selah <WH5542>.
He that is our God <WH410> is the God <WH410> of salvation <WH4190>; and unto God <WH3069> the Lord <WH136> belong the issues <WH8444> from death <WH4194>.
But God <WH430> shall wound <WH4272> the head <WH7218> of his enemies <WH341>, and the hairy <WH8181> scalp <WH6936> of such a one as goes on still <WH1980> in his trespasses <WH817>.
The Lord <WH136> said <WH559>, I will bring again <WH7725> from Bashan <WH1316>, I will bring my people again <WH7725> from the depths <WH4688> of the sea <WH3220>:
That your foot <WH7272> may be dipped <WH4272> in the blood <WH1818> of your enemies <WH341>, and the tongue <WH3956> of your dogs in the same <WH3611>.
They have seen <WH7200> your goings <WH1979>, O God <WH430>; even the goings <WH1979> of my God <WH410>, my King <WH4428>, in the sanctuary <WH6944>.
The singers <WH7891> went before <WH6923>, the players on instruments <WH5059> followed after <WH310>; among <WH8432> them were the damsels <WH5959> playing with tambourines <WH8608>.
Bless <WH1288> you God <WH430> in the congregations <WH4721>, even the Lord <WH136>, from the fountain <WH4726> of Israel <WH3478>.

There is little <WH6810> Benjamin <WH1144> with their ruler <WH7287>, the princes <WH8269> of Judah <WH3063> and their council <WH7277>, the princes <WH8269> of Zebulun <WH2074>, and the princes <WH8269> of Naphtali <WH5321>.
Your God <WH430> has commanded <WH6680> your strength <WH5797>: strengthen <WH5810>, O God <WH430>, that which <WH2098> you have done for us <WH6466>.
Because of your temple <WH1964> at Jerusalem <WH3389> shall kings <WH4428> bring <WH2986> presents unto you <WH7862>.

Rebuke <WH1605> the company <WH2416> of spearmen <WH7070>, the multitude <WH5712> of the bulls <WH47>, with the calves <WH5695> of the people <WH5971>, until every one submit <WH7511> himself with pieces <WH7518> of silver <WH3701>: scatter <WH967> you the people <WH5971> that delight <WH2654> in war <WH7128>.
Princes <WH2831> shall come out <WH857> of Egypt <WH4714>; Ethiopia <WH3568> shall soon stretch out <WH7323> her hands <WH3027> unto God <WH430>.
Sing <WH7891> unto God <WH430>, you kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776>; O sing praises <WH2167> unto the Lord <WH136>; Selah <WH5542>:
To him that rides <WH7392> upon the heavens <WH8064> of heavens <WH8064>, which were of old <WH6924>; behold <WH5414>, he does send out his voice <WH6963>, and that a mighty <WH5797> voice <WH6963>.
Ascribe <WH5414> you strength <WH5797> unto God <WH430>: his excellency <WH1346> is over Israel <WH3478>, and his strength <WH5797> is in the clouds <WH7834>.

O God <WH430>, you are terrible <WH3372> out of your holy places <WH4720>: the God <WH410> of Israel <WH3478> is he that gives <WH5414> strength <WH5797> and power <WH8592> unto his people <WH5971>. Blessed <WH1288> be God <WH430>.
